SEARCH
Package com.example.ticketbooking.controller

Class SimulationController

java.lang.Object
com.example.ticketbooking.controller.SimulationController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/simulation") @CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:4200") public class SimulationController extends Object
This class defines REST API endpoints for managing simulations in a ticket booking system. It interacts with the TicketService to perform simulation operations like saving configurations, starting simulations, and stopping simulations.

  • Constructor Details

    • SimulationController

      public SimulationController()

  • Method Details

    • saveConfiguration

      @PostMapping("/save") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> saveConfiguration(@RequestBody Configuration config)
      This endpoint saves a provided Configuration object to a JSON file and stores it in memory for future reference.
      Parameters:
      config - The configuration object to be saved.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity object indicating success or failure with a message.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there's an error writing the configuration to the file.

    • startSimulation

      @PostMapping("/start") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> startSimulation()
      This endpoint starts a simulation based on the previously saved Configuration. It checks if a configuration is saved and then calls the `TicketService` methods to initialize and start the simulation.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity object indicating success or failure with a message.
      Throws:
      Exception - If there's an error during simulation initialization or start.

    • stopSimulation

      @PostMapping("/stop") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> stopSimulation()
      This endpoint stops the ongoing simulation by calling the `stopSimulation` method of the injected TicketService.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity object indicating success with a message.
      Throws:
      Exception - If there's an error during stopping the simulation.

    • getSimulationStatus

      @GetMapping("/status") public Object getSimulationStatus()
      This endpoint retrieves the current simulation status from the TicketService. The specific format of the returned object depends on the implementation of the `getSimulationStatus` method in the service.
      Returns:
      The current simulation status as returned by the `TicketService`.
